source.sqlReaderQuery: select top (10) object_id, name from sys.objects;

select 
	t1.src, t1.stg
from (values 
	(N'dbo.src_demo_product', N'dbo.stg_demo_product'),
	(N'dbo.src_demo_customer', N'dbo.stg_demo_customer')
) t1 (src, stg)

select *
from (values
	(N'file-data', N'demo/ssiswork/地点数据', N'Sheet1', N'dbo.City'),
	(N'file-data', N'demo/ssiswork/产品数据', N'Sheet1', N'dbo.Product'),
	(N'file-data', N'demo/ssiswork/客户数据', N'Sheet1', N'dbo.Customer'),
	(N'file-data', N'demo/ssiswork/订单数据', N'Sheet1', N'dbo.[Order]')
) t1(container_name,direcotry_name,sheet_name, stg);
